name: INTERNAL/EXTERNAL
description:
I often perceive that my mind is split into two halves. One half is inward facing and concerned with internal matters like imagination and feeling. It is uncaring and agnostic of the outside world. The other half is the outward facing one, which deals with socializing and externally motivated ambition. They do not get along.

INTERNAL/EXTERNAL is a gamified experience based on a conversation between these two halves.
